医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示男性和女性对压力的反应存在差异还有人记得2020年新冠疫情初期吗？商店、餐馆、电影院和剧院仍然关闭。当禁止与朋友和亲戚会面时。当学校的课程必须在家里的孩子们的房间里进行时。当没有旅行的问题时。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-shows-differences- Between-men-and-womens-reaction-to-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-shows-differences- Between-men-and-womens-reaction-to-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83edd30e-bd19-4c5f-82e1-0ec31bdf3c8b Mon, 31 Jul 2023 08:30:06 -0400 Study shows differences between men and women's reaction to stress
杜兰大学研究发现嗜酸性粒细胞性食管炎的潜在治疗方法杜兰大学的一项新研究发现了一种治疗慢性免疫系统疾病的新疗法，这种疾病可以阻止儿童进食。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Tulane-study-finds-pottial-treatment-for-eosinophilic-esophagitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Tulane-study-finds-pottial-treatment-for-eosinophilic-esophagitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f4e85b9-9784-460d-826d-9afb8a7df713 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 08:17:11 -0400 Tulane study finds potential treatment for eosinophilic esophagitis
新分析发现，摄入更多酒精可能会导致血压升高根据今天发表在美国心脏协会杂志《高血压》上的七项国际研究的分析，即使是没有高血压的成年人，多年来，随着每日酒精饮料数量的增加，血压读数也可能会急剧上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/More-alcohol-intake-may-increase-blood-Pressure-finds-new-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/More-alcohol-intake-may-increase-blood-Pressure-finds-new-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bdbb229-c5e3-4fee-bdb3-5fb9200c6736 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 08:11:07 -0400 More alcohol intake may increase blood pressure, finds new analysis
研究人员研究了一种新型肿瘤内药物递送载体治疗口腔鳞状细胞癌的功效研究人员研究了一种新型肿瘤内药物递送载体治疗口腔鳞状细胞癌的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-investigate-the-efficacy-of-a-novel-intra-tumoral-drug-delivery-carrier-in-treating-oral-squamous-cell-癌.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-investigate-the-efficacy-of-a-novel-intra-tumoral-drug-delivery-carrier-in-treating-oral-squamous-cell- cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dedb1f8-29ef-4c3c-8fe8-3ab5f03135ab Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:59:00 -0400 Researchers investigate the efficacy of a novel intra-tumoral drug delivery carrier in treating oral squamous cell carcinoma
研究发现，二分之一的人一生中会患上心理健康障碍昆士兰大学和哈佛医学院的研究人员共同领导的一项全球研究发现，二分之一的人在一生中会患上精神健康疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/One-in-two-people-will-develop-a-mental-health-disorder-in-their-lifetime-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/One-in-two-people-will-develop-a-mental-health-disorder-in-their-lifetime-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f375a3b-2cef-4771-84d9-de7cbf078ae8 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:56:41 -0400 One in two people will develop a mental health disorder in their lifetime, finds study
新型疫苗针对阿尔茨海默氏症发炎的脑细胞来改变疾病进程根据美国心脏协会 2023 年基础心血管科学科学会议上发表的初步研究，一种针对与阿尔茨海默病相关的发炎脑细胞的新型疫苗可能是预防或改变该病进程的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Novel-vaccine-targets-inflamed-brain-cells-in-Alzheimers-to-modify-the-course-of-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Novel-vaccine-targets-inflamed-brain-cells-in-Alzheimers-to-modify-the-course-of-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4aa049fe-c33b-400b-aeb2-62e852994e2c Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:52:12 -0400 Novel vaccine targets inflamed brain cells in Alzheimer's to modify the course of disease
彻底改变 COVID-19 ARDS 预测：针对危重患者的深度学习模型研究人员开发并评估了一种用于预测 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 的深度学习模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Revolutionizing-COVID-19-ARDS-prediction-a-deep-learning-model-for-cruitly-ill-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Revolutionizing-COVID-19-ARDS-prediction-a-deep-learning-model-for-riticly-ill-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38db92fc-121c-471d-8c41-055a9d484c6f Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:46:00 -0400 Revolutionizing COVID-19 ARDS prediction: a deep learning model for critically ill patients
研究表明抗 PTM 抗体通常存在于自身免疫介导的肝病中最近发表在《医学前沿》上的一项研究描述了患有自身免疫介导的胆汁淤积性肝病 (AILD) 患者的抗翻译后修饰 (PTM) 抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-shows-that-anti-PTM-antibodies-are-often-present-in-autoimmune-mediad-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Study-shows-that-anti-PTM-antibodies-are-often-present-in-autoimmune-mediad-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=414950d7-4f86-4c5e-8072-9cc84e7b0cc4 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:28:00 -0400 Study shows that anti-PTM antibodies are often present in autoimmune mediated liver disease
研究人员发现具有抗阿尔茨海默病治疗潜力的新型螺吲哚啉-1,2-二氮杂卓衍生物在最近的一项研究中，研究人员设计了具有胆碱酯酶抑制活性的取代螺吲哚啉-1,2-二氮杂卓衍生物“5a-v”作为抗阿尔茨海默病药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-discover-new-spiroindolin-12-diazepine-derivatives-with-anti-Alzheimer-therapeutic-potial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/Researchers-discover-new-spiroindolin-12-diazepine-derivatives-with-anti-Alzheimer-therapeutic-potial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d787168-77f3-4dff-b390-2422badd7064 Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:16:00 -0400 Researchers discover new spiroindolin-1,2-diazepine derivatives with anti-Alzheimer therapeutic potential
mRNA、灭活 COVID-19 疫苗和 SARS-CoV-2 感染后糖尿病的发病率研究人员评估了与 COVID-19 疫苗接种和感染相关的新发糖尿病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/The-incidence-of-diabetes-following-mRNA-inactivated-COVID-19-vaccines-and-after-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230731/The-incidence-of-diabetes-following-mRNA-inactivated-COVID-19-vaccines-and-after-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e20491b-b0f9-4a80-af92-5e323e77f95b Mon, 31 Jul 2023 07:12:00 -0400 The incidence of diabetes following mRNA, inactivated COVID-19 vaccines, and after SARS-CoV-2 infection
